projects.name: Yacht Booking app
projects.description: This is a full-stack app for booking yachts, where users can reserve their selected yachts. Also, users can see their reservations, cancel the reservation as well as add more Yachts.

projects.name: Expense Tracker
projects.description: This application can be used to track your expenses with various groups or category. Any mobile-end users can use this web-application.

projects.name: Population Metrics - (Mobile Web App.)
projects.description: Population Metrics is a mobile web application that provides population stats on country basis.

projects.name: Space Travelers Hub
projects.description: Space Traveler's Hub is designed to make space travel more accessible than ever before. The app allows users to reserve flights on various spacecraft and get information on space-related activities.

projects.name: Startup Society Dhaka Summit 2023
projects.description: This is a conference event based website made with static-stack and used for online presence with event join invitations
